proof_script:
lemma bind2let_refine[refine2]: assumes "RETURN x \<le> \<Down>R' M'" assumes "\<And>x'. (x,x')\<in>R' \<Longrightarrow> f x \<le> \<Down>R (f' x')" shows "Let x f \<le> \<Down>R (bind M' (\<lambda>x'. f' x'))"
using assms
by (simp add: pw_le_iff refine_pw_simps) blast
